mapper.insert: insert into ZYJCSJHJ (GQPBH, JCDBH, JCSJ, JCQX, GCZX, GCZY, GCZH, BQXWY, BQYWY, BQHWY, BQXFXWY, BQYFXWY, BQHFXWY, ZT, YC) values (#{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jcqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gczx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gczy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{gczh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bqxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bqywy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bqhwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bqxfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bqyfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{bqhfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yc,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update ZYJCSJHJ set JCQX = #{jcqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GCZX = #{gczx,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GCZY = #{gczy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GCZH = #{gczh,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQXWY = #{bqxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQYWY = #{bqywy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQHWY = #{bqhwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQXFXWY = #{bqxfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQYFXWY = #{bqyfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, BQHFXWY = #{bqhfxwy,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, ZT = #{zt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YC = #{yc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where GQPBH = #{gqpbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JCDBH = #{jcdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and JCSJ = #{jcsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: select GQPBH, JCDBH, JCSJ, JCQX, GCZX, GCZY, GCZH, BQXWY, BQYWY, BQHWY, BQXFXWY, BQYFXWY, BQHFXWY, ZT, YC from ZYJCSJHJ
